greenmirror.server

Class Visualizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • greenmirror.server.Visualizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VisualizerMemento.Caretaker, VisualizerMemento.Originator

    public class Visualizer
extends javafx.application.Application
implements VisualizerMemento.Caretaker, VisualizerMemento.Originator
    The main visualizer class and JavaFX application. It starts the log window and waits for connections. Memento design pattern: https://sourcemaking.com/design_patterns/memento Originator role: toState(Transition), saveState(SequentialTransition) Caretaker role: (addMemento(Memento) ->) saveState(SequentialTransition), getPreviousState(), getNextState()
    Author:
    Karim El Assal

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static interface  Visualizer.PlaybackState
      An abstract state class in accordance with the state design pattern.

      • toNextMemento

        public void toNextMemento()
        Transition to the next state. Any code that needs to be executed after the transition has finished should be set with getNextMemento().getTransition().setOnFinished(...).

      • toPreviousMemento

        public void toPreviousMemento()
        Transition to the previous state. Any code that needs to be executed after the transition has finished should be set with getPreviousMemento().getTransition().setOnFinished(...).

      • transitionFinished

        public void transitionFinished(javafx.animation.Transition transition,
                               boolean goingForward)
        Execute when a transition has finished. It also enables or disables the toolbar buttons based on the current playback state and transitions to the next state if the playback state is continuous (and a next state exists).
        Parameters:
        transition - The Transition that just finished.
        goingForward - true if we are/were going forward; false if backward.

      • listTransitions

        public static java.lang.Object listTransitions(javafx.animation.Transition transitions)
        A (recursive) debug method for checking which transitions are inside transitions.
        Parameters:
        transitions - The main transition. Probably a sequential or parallel one.
        Returns:
        A Map if it's a SequentialTransition of ParallelTransition; a String if it's any other (standalone) transition.
